Find the mask that you need!

Wearing a face mask will help prevent the spread of infection and prevent the individual from contracting any airborne infectious germs. When someone coughs, talks, sneezes they could release germs into the air that may infect others nearby. Face masks are part of an infection control strategy to eliminate cross-contamination.

The Factories are struggling tp keep up with the demand of mask,Factories have been scrambling to make 20 times more surgical masks and N95 respirators.

PM Narendra Modi

Importance of Wearing mask by PM Narendra Modi

During Mann Ki Baat PM Narendra Modi made two appeals to people of India â€“ one, to wear face masks as a precaution in the times to come and two, to avoid spitting in public places. Both the measures, PM Modi said would help India fight against Coronavirus pandemic.

W.H.O.

WHO Advices to wear mask

This document provides advice on the use of masks in communities, during home care, and in health care settings in areas that have reported cases of COVID-19. To reduce the community spread we need to prepare to proctect us from COVID 19 pandemic.

M.O.H.F.W.

Ministry Of Health & Family Welfare Government directed to wear mask

If you are healthy, you only need to wear a mask if you are taking care of a person with suspected COVID 19 infection.Mask are effective only when used in combinitation with frequent hand-cleaning with alcohol-based hand rub or soap and water.
